form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To enable State homes to furnish nursing home care to parents any of whose children died while serving in the Armed Forces.

section.header: Expansion of state home care for parents of veterans who died while serving in armed forces
section.text: In administering section 51.210(d) of title 38, Code of Federal Regulations, the Secretary of Veterans Affairs shall permit a State home to provide services to, in addition to non-veterans described in such subsection, a non-veteran any of whose children died while serving in the Armed Forces.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives June 30, 2010.
